boost::sql_cli::null_value

boost::sql_cli::null_value< ValueT > Class Template Reference

#include <boost/sql_cli/null_value.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<typename ValueT>
class boost::sql_cli::null_value< ValueT >

Represents a typed null value. It is typically used for input parameters that are always null.
